Name: COM_NOT_FOUND
Description: 串口不存在

Name: COM_BUSY
Description: 串口被占用

Name: COM_UNKNOWN_ERROR
Description: 未知错误(打开串口)

Name: COM_SET_PARAMETER_ERROR
Description: 设置串口参数失败

Name: APPCMD_READ_FAIL
APPCMD_WRITE_FAIL
Description: 上位机指令发送失败，请重新上电！

Name: APPCMD_ERROR_0x80
Description: 下位机报0x80错误，请重新上电！

Name: APPCMD_NOT_READY
Description: 设备未就绪，请重新上电！

Name: APPCMD_RUNNING
Description: 设备正在运行，禁止升级！

Name: APPCMD_PIN_NOT_USE
Description: boot引脚未使用，请插上引脚再试一次！

Name: APPCMD_ERROR_CHECK
Description: 响应帧的CRC校验错误，请重新上电！

Name: PROTOCOL_READ_FAIL
PROTOCOL_WRITE_FAIL
Description: 上位机指令发送失败，请重新上电！

Name: PROTOCOL_CRC_CHECK_ERROR
Description: 响应帧的CRC校验错误，请重新上电！

Name: PROTOCOL_ARM_RMRROTECTION_FAIL
Description: arm芯片解保护失败，请重试！

Name: PROTOCOL_ARM_UNKNOW_ACK
Description: arm芯片未定义的应答，请重试！

Name: PROTOCOL_ARM_RMPROTECTION_NO
Description: 升级程序不允许跳线，请去掉跳！

Name: NULL
Description: 无OTP(boot)，请先烧录BootLoader！

Name: NULL
Description: 帧地址错误

Name: NULL
Description: 设置文件的CRC32与实际CRC32不匹配

Name: NULL
Description: 修改Boot地址超过范围

Name: NULL
Description: 编程起始地址越界

Name: NULL
Description: 编程长度越界

Name: NULL
Description: 数据帧帧号错误
